The Kayn and Rhaast Announcer pack was a limited time announcer available during the September 2018 Odyssey event. It featured Dark Star Rhaast and Odyssey Kayn as replacement announcers on all available PvP maps.

Kayn and Rhaast also appeared alongside Odyssey Ziggs, Odyssey Jinx, Odyssey Sona, Odyssey Yasuo and Odyssey Malphite as Game mode announcers for the limited time gamemode, Odyssey: Extraction.

  • General
  • Extraction

References[]

Trivia[]

Kayn, the Shadow Reaper & Rhaast, the Darkin Scythe
  • ▶️   "Zed's dead baby, Zed's dead." quotes Pulp Fiction.
Odyssey Kayn

▶️   "ORA, ORA, ORA." references the battle cry from JoJo's Bizarre Adventure.

HEARTSTEEL Kayn
  • ▶️   "You want it? You have to take it." references the quote of Vergil from Devil May Cry 5.
  • ▶️   "K/DA? I'll show them what I'm made of." is a possible reference to the song I'LL SHOW YOU by K/DA.
  • ▶️   "It's all blood, sweat and tears." references the eponymous song by BTS.
  • ▶️   "Tired? I could do this all day!" most likely references Captain America's catchphrase.
